LanguageData.ZB333ZB.Settings.Title: ZB333ZB's Patches
LanguageData.ZB333ZB.Settings.RestartRequiredDesc: Game restart is required for the changes to take effect.
LanguageData.ZB333ZB.Settings.ApplyToAllDoors.Tooltip: Adds a button in door lock settings that allows applying settings from the current tab to all colony doors
LanguageData.ZB333ZB.Settings.AutoRebuildTerrain.Tool: Destroyed terrain during Seismic Activity is now set for auto-rebuild. For this to work, Auto-rebuild must be enabled and terrain must be in home zone
LanguageData.ZB333ZB.Settings.EnhancedDefSelector.Too: Replaces the laggy float menu list of available defs in the scenario editor with a fixed window with built-in list
LanguageData.ZB333ZB.Settings.StorageSelector.Tooltip:
Adds DeepStorage support in Bill Config Dialogue on par with stockpiles. Replaces vanilla "Take from" and "Deliver to" buttons with custom ones. Adds a popup window with built-in search for selecting from available storages/stockpiles.

Integrated What's Missing mod by Revolus:
"<color=#a7bda7>Highlighted requirements and tooltips for recipe descriptions. When a recipe has many ingredients, it's quite annoying to lookup what's missing. This mod tells you everything you need to know at first glance. Or at least it tells you a lot.</color>"

Integration was necessary to ensure correct UI rendering in Bill Config Dialog, as both mods modify the same interface.
LanguageData.ZB333ZB.Settings.ToggleDBHGrids.Tooltip: Adds a WidgetRow icon to display water grids from Dubs Bad Hygiene. Deep water grid display requires researching the corresponding technology
LanguageData.ZB333ZB.Settings.ToggleRimefellerGrids.T: Adds a WidgetRow icon to display oil grids from Rimefeller. Display of each grid requires researching the corresponding technology
